attributes.action: Force manufacturers to give clear warning message on washing machines and dryers
attributes.additional_details: Too many pet owners have lost their beloved pets due to a simple, yet avoidable mistake by not realising where their pets are. Olive was our 5 month old kitten who died tragically in our tumble dryer. This could have been avoided if the person responsible was educated on the risks. Too many manufacturers hide the warning in difficult to read manuals. Manufacturers need to make it clear that there can be a danger to small animals and people if not handled properly.
attributes.background: Help prevent accident related deaths to pets at home by making it mandatory for washing machine and tumble dryer manufacturers to apply a caution message on the outside of their machines for owners to check for pets inside the machines before operation.

rejection.details: While we can see that you'd like to prevent risk to pets at home, it is a matter for individual companies to decide how they present their safety guidance.
